name: Game-U 2D Adventure
description:
Press buttons, open doors, and make it to the blue goal!

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys to move
  • Left click to pick up or drop objects
  • Right click to store or retrieve objects
  • Left Shift to throw objects or shoot arrows
  • Esc to open the pause menu
  • F5 to restart

Created for Game-U LIVE. Watch recordings here!
